description.value:
Aura 0

At the start of Turaglas's turn, each creature in Turaglas's space takes 10 damage and 10 acid damage and Turaglas slides it 1 square.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Acid

Standard

+35 vs AC

2d6+4 damage plus 2d6 acid damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Reach 0

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Acid, Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

One or two targets; +33 vs Reflex; 2d12+8 acid damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Acid

Minor, At-Will

+35 vs AC

2d6+8 damage, plus 2d6 acid damage, and the target is pulled into Turaglas's space and slowed (save ends). Reach 3

At-Will

Immediate Interrupt

Reach 3

Trigger: When an enemy leaves turaglas' space, at-will

+35 vs AC; the target is pulled into Turaglas' space. targets the triggering creature

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Acid

Standard

Close burst 3

+33 vs Reflex; Turaglas washes outward in a wave of flesh and then retracts; 2d12 + 15 acid damage, and the target is pulled into Turaglas's space and slowed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 6

+31 vs Reflex; 2d10+8 acid damage, plus the target is slowed (save ends).

Recharge 6

Close burst 1

Targets creatures outside Turaglas' space; +33 vs Reflex; 2d6+8 damage and 2d6 acid damage.

Miss: The target can shift 1 square as a free action to avoid Turaglas as it expands. Effect: Turaglas grows to fill the burst. At the end of the encounter, Turaglas returns to its standard size (typically 5 squares by 5 squares).

Acid

Minor

Trigger: When turaglas uses expand

Turaglas shrinks in space by 1 square. Each creature in Turaglas' space is pulled 2 squares toward Turaglas' center. Turaglas cannot become smaller than 5 squares by 5 squares.

Standard

Trigger: When first bloodied

Turaglas recharges expand and uses it twice. Until the end of the encounter, expand recharges on a 5 or a 6.

Turaglas consists of gooey flesh approximately waist high in the squares it occupies. It can enter and occupy squares occupied by other creatures, and other creatures can enter and occupy squares occupied by Turaglas. Turaglas's space is difficult terrain to all creatures except Turaglas.

When Turaglas is dazed, it instead grants combat advantage to all enemies for the same duration. When Turaglas is stunned, it grants combat advantage to all enemies and is immobilized for the same duration.

Standard

Trigger: When a living enemy drops to 0 hit points or fewer while in turaglas' space

Turaglas regains hit points equal to the triggering creature's bloodied value or gains 1 action point.

HP 1128; Bloodied 564
Resist 25 acid, 10 variable (3/encounter) Immune disease, gaze 		Init +18 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 44Ref 40Will 43
Speed 4, climb 4 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 33 (+26)
Con 34 (+27)		Dex 17 (+18)
Int 24 (+22)		Wis 28 (+24)
Cha 24 (+22)
Languages Abyssal, Common
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +27, Athletics +31, History +27, Religion +27Senses | Blindsight 100, tremorsense 20 |
Passive Perception 34 | Insight 34
